snippet: Cupcakes and other baked goods will be spared the chopping block at Massachusetts schools after Gov. Deval Patrick said he would sign a measure lifting a ban on the sale of the treats at school bake sales.
lead_paragraph: Cupcakes and other baked goods will be spared the chopping block at Massachusetts schools after Gov. Deval Patrick said he would sign a measure lifting a ban on the sale of the treats at school bake sales.

headline.main: Massachusetts: Devil’s Food Treats Lose Sinful Status
headline.print_headline: Massachusetts: Devil’s Food Treats Lose Sinful Status
